column5: Went down to the bay today with my new Pflueger President combo, had Tightline put some PowerPro 20lb on it last week so I thought I would try it on some pike.  No Pike.  BUT...   Also NO birdnests on the reel (even after dozens of casts), and I even had my Zara Spook 'walking the dog', although admittedly looking a bit drunk.  Maybe it WAS the equipment?
Nice going dave !!!!! yup, it was the equipment for sure!!!!! I always knew you could do it man !!!!!
Another good review of the President. Now let's see if the equipment catches you more fish!
Way to go!   Now there is a pain the neck you can scratch off the list.  Great news.
Thanks gents. I was raised on the old phrase "a bad workman always blames his tools", maybe I shouldn't stick to that so rigorously.
Way to go Dave. Glad to hear the problems aren't still happening.
